marklogic.body: Keith, Keith, Keith.... not again. He's a really smart guy and he should be listened to because he makes a lot of sense and isn't afraid to call a spade a spade. And there are really very few progressive TV personalities compared to the multiutude of their conservative brethern on FNC alone, but he's really a prima dona of the highest order. One of his old collegues at ESPN said of him on his tumultuous departure from the sports network, "Keith doesn't just Burn his bridges, he napalms 'em." That Always cracks me up.
